author: Gawain

text:
this song is really pretty. When someone thinks of a castlevania game they don't immediately think of a tune that is this light and refreshing but that's what makes this track so cool.  It's incongruity adds a fresh new spin to the idea of sword fighting demons in the night. It captures the innate sci-fi romanticism that surrounds the vampiric ethos.

That & it's pretty baddazz too.     ; D

text:

author: Ankarua

text: So Supra, how far are you into the game?  The only thing I haven't done (but probably will prevail in soon) is the Large Cavern.

text: Yes, I completely agree.  I haven't heard music this good from any other game, at least in this type of genre.  It really appeals to the side of you that likes mystery and shadow.

author: Talking Too Much About Games

text:
Michiru Yamane is definitely one of my favorite composers of all time. The music she creates for Castlevania games has such an incredible yet very mysterious feel that I find it very hard to describe. Which is great! 

(oh, and I completely agree with stick666thekiller's Shadow Of The Colossus comment)
